ActSafe and Regulated Sports Betting Act
SubjectOrder Fixing August 27, 2021 as the Day on Which that Act Comes into Force
PrecisOrder fixing August 27, 2021, as the day on which the SAFE AND REGULATED SPORTS BETTING ACT (Bill C-218, An Act to amend the Criminal Code), chapter 20 of the Statutes of Canada, 2021, COMES INTO FORCE.
